title: Sans Serif Condensed Font
content:
Hi all,

This is probly super easy for you type guys, but i cant figure out what this font is.

Thanks in advanced

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sans serif-condensed.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120109081714/http:/typophile.com/files/Sans%20serif-condensed.png) | 90.67 KB |
author: beek

comments.content:
I think that one is [Akzidenz Grotesk Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20120109081714/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-bq/). The R is not the same as the font in the COASTAL BRAKE post you also looked at.

- Mike Yanega

[Alternate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120109081714/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/alternate-gothic-sb/) might be closer. The light type on the darker background has a way of changing the look.

- Mike Yanega
